sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnbatchschdul ( batch_schdul_id , batch_opert_id , execut_cycle , execut_schdul_de , execut_schdul_hour , execut_schdul_mnt , execut_schdul_secnd , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm ) VALUES ( #batchSchdulId# , #batchOpertId# , #executCycle# , #executSchdulDe# , #executSchdulHour# , #executSchdulMnt# , #executSchdulSecnd# , #frstRegisterId# , SYSDATE )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnbatchschdul SET batch_schdul_id = #batchSchdulId# , batch_opert_id = #batchOpertId# , execut_cycle = #executCycle# , execut_schdul_de = #executSchdulDe# , execut_schdul_hour = #executSchdulHour# , execut_schdul_mnt = #executSchdulMnt# , execut_schdul_secnd = #executSchdulSecnd# , last_updusr_id = #lastUpdusrId# , last_updt_pnttm = SYSDATE WHERE 1 = 1 AND batch_schdul_id = #batchSchdulId#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtnbatchschdul WHERE 1 = 1 AND batch_schdul_id = #batchSchdulId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT batch_schdul_id , batch_opert_id , execut_cycle , execut_schdul_de , execut_schdul_hour , execut_schdul_mnt , execut_schdul_secnd , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm FROM COMTNBATCHSCHDUL WHERE batch_schdul_id = #batchSchdulId#

SELECT A.BATCH_SCHDUL_ID , A.BATCH_OPERT_ID , A.EXECUT_CYCLE , A.EXECUT_SCHDUL_DE , A.EXECUT_SCHDUL_HOUR , A.EXECUT_SCHDUL_MNT , A.EXECUT_SCHDUL_SECND , A.FRST_REGISTER_ID , A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID , A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM FROM ( SELECT BATCH_SCHDUL_ID , BATCH_OPERT_ID , EXECUT_CYCLE , EXECUT_SCHDUL_DE , EXECUT_SCHDUL_HOUR , EXECUT_SCHDUL_MNT , EXECUT_SCHDUL_SECND , FRST_REGISTER_ID , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , LAST_UPDUSR_ID , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , ROWNUM FROM COMTNBATCHSCHDUL WHERE 1=1
BATCH_SCHDUL_ID = #searchKeyword#
BATCH_OPERT_ID LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY BATCH_SCHDUL_ID DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN #firstIndex# AND #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTNBATCHSCHDUL WHERE 1=1
BATCH_SCHDUL_ID = #searchKeyword#
BATCH_OPERT_ID LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
